title: WTB: Looking for some PSA cards
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: WTB: Looking for some PSA cards
posts.post_content:
Looking for some PSA 3-4.5 cards to upgrade my set. If you have any of these available, please let me know. Would love to get these in a 4 if possible. 

And if you want to downgrade, I have all of these available in lower grade.

Good amount of stuff to trade also. Just shoot me a PM or comment below with what you got!

Greminger
Hickman
Howard, Ernie
Lentz
Mullaney
Pelty horizontal
Powers
Quinn
Revelle
Smith, Frank Chi-Bos
If you have any of these available, please let me know!
